headline: Morgan Stanley Warns Investors to Avoid McDonald’s Corporation (MCD) Amid Growing Challenges
summary: McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) is one of the best Dow stocks to invest in. Morgan Stanley suggested that the company may soon start feeling some of the broader challenges affecting the fast food industry. On June 9, the firm downgraded the stock from “Overweight” to “Equal Weight” and lowered its price target from $329 to $324 […]
